name: Astrid
storyline:
“Astrid” is an interactive film that combines 3D gameplay, point and click and classic decisions.

In the near future, a technology called “Mindscape” allows you to save, share and relive memories.
One day Astrid wakes up and can’t remember the last years of her life. Plagued by flashbacks and visions of a strange mansion, she embarks on a journey to recover her lost past. Help Astrid break into the mansion from her flashbacks to recover her memories by making decisions and solving riddles.
summary: Recover Astrid's lost memories in this FMV adventure that combines decision-based and 3D gameplay.
